column2: Disabled `PointlessArithmetic` inspection when the expression is non-resolvable

column3:
Spock's Mock interactions shouldn't be flagged as PointlessArithmeticExpression, e.g.
0 * mockAmazonCloudWatchClient.putMetricAlarm(_)
@dovchinnikov any reason this was not merged? This is a really annoying false positive.
@leonard84 most probably it got lost in notifications, sorry.

I've checked the request, while it's okay as disabling inspection for non-resolvable, I think the problem is that such expression are unresolvable in the first place, and to make them resolvable we need bigger changes in the API. I was working on such API recently, but it got delayed due to other unfinished tasks.

@dovchinnikov, personally I think a temporary working solution that partially fixes things is better than none.
I've committed a few more similar PRs, please check them too
